com.github.mibac138.argparser.reader

Class ArgumentReaderUtil

  • public class ArgumentReaderUtil

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ArgumentReader asReader(java.lang.Object $receiver)
      Returns your object as a argument reader

      static java.util.regex.MatchResult matchMatcher(ArgumentReader $receiver, java.util.regex.Matcher matcher, int readStep) 
      static java.util.regex.MatchResult matchPattern(ArgumentReader $receiver, java.util.regex.Pattern pattern, int readStep) 
      static java.lang.String readUntilChar(ArgumentReader $receiver, char targetChar)
      Reads the reader until it hits the given targetChar or ArgumentReader.hasNext returns false. If possible, use readUntilChar with action as argument instead of this function as it reverts read text in case your code threw an exception
      static <T> T readUntilChar(ArgumentReader $receiver, char targetChar, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.String,? extends T> action)
      Reads text until hits a space and passes it to action
      static void skipChar(ArgumentReader $receiver, char targetChar) 
      static void skipUntilChar(ArgumentReader $receiver, char targetChar, boolean inclusive) 

    • Method Detail

      • readUntilChar

        public static java.lang.String readUntilChar(ArgumentReader $receiver,
                                             char targetChar)

        Reads the reader until it hits the given targetChar or ArgumentReader.hasNext returns false. If possible, use readUntilChar with action as argument instead of this function as it reverts read text in case your code threw an exception

        See Also:
        ArgumentReader.hasNext

      • readUntilChar

        public static <T> T readUntilChar(ArgumentReader $receiver,
                                  char targetChar,
                                  kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.String,? extends T> action)

        Reads text until hits a space and passes it to action

        In case executing action throws an exception read text is reverted (you will be able to read it again) and exception is passed on

      • skipChar

        public static void skipChar(ArgumentReader $receiver,
                            char targetChar)

      • skipUntilChar

        public static void skipUntilChar(ArgumentReader $receiver,
                                 char targetChar,
                                 boolean inclusive)
